description: This file contains styles for the PostCard component of an Instagram clone frontend, defining the visual layout and appearance of elements such as the card header, avatar, user information, image box, and responsiveness for different screen sizes.

classes.name: post-card
classes.description: Main container for the post card, including layout styles like background, border, margin, and shadow.

classes.name: post-card__header
classes.description: Header section of the post card, including user avatar, username, and styling for alignment and padding.

classes.name: post-card__avatar
classes.description: Styling for the user's avatar image, including border and radius properties.

classes.name: post-card__user
classes.description: Styling for the user display name within the post card.

classes.name: post-card__username
classes.description: Styling for the username display under the user name on the post card.

classes.name: post-card__imgbox
classes.description: Box containing the image of the post, with styling for alignment and background.

classes.name: post-card__img
classes.description: Styling for the post image, including width, height, and display properties.

classes.name: post-card__body
classes.description: Body section of the post card, containing post content with padding and gap.

classes.name: post-card__caption
classes.description: Styling for the caption text of the post within the card.

classes.name: post-card__user-short
classes.description: Short user information styling for better emphasis within the post's body.

classes.name: post-card__timestamp
classes.description: Styling for displaying the timestamp of the user's post.
